mapper.sql: item_id as itemId, sell_share as sellShare, finance_amount as financeAmount, register_capital as registerCapital, captital_reserve as captitalReserve, after_register_capital as afterRegisterCapital, lead_investor_id as leadInvestorId, lead_investor_amount as leadInvestorAmount, executive_partner as executivePartner, lead_investor_reason as leadInvestorReason, limited_partnership_id1 as limitedPartnershipId1, limited_partnership_id2 as limitedPartnershipId2, limited_partnership_id3 as limitedPartnershipId3, limited_partnership_id4 as limitedPartnershipId4, equity_template as equityTemplate, partnership_template as partnershipTemplate
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO (item_id, sell_share, finance_amount, register_capital, captital_reserve, after_register_capital, lead_investor_id, lead_investor_amount, executive_partner, lead_investor_reason, limited_partnership_id1, limited_partnership_id2, limited_partnership_id3, limited_partnership_id4, equity_template, partnership_template) VALUES (#{itemId}, #{sellShare}, #{financeAmount}, #{registerCapital}, #{captitalReserve}, #{afterRegisterCapital}, #{leadInvestorId}, #{leadInvestorAmount}, #{executivePartner}, #{leadInvestorReason}, #{limitedPartnershipId1}, #{limitedPartnershipId2}, #{limitedPartnershipId3}, #{limitedPartnershipId4}, #{equityTemplate}, #{partnershipTemplate})
mapper.update:
UPDATE
item_id=#{itemId},
sell_share=#{sellShare},
finance_amount=#{financeAmount},
register_capital=#{registerCapital},
captital_reserve=#{captitalReserve},
after_register_capital=#{afterRegisterCapital},
lead_investor_id=#{leadInvestorId},
lead_investor_amount=#{leadInvestorAmount},
executive_partner=#{executivePartner},
lead_investor_reason=#{leadInvestorReason},
limited_partnership_id1=#{limitedPartnershipId1},
limited_partnership_id2=#{limitedPartnershipId2},
limited_partnership_id3=#{limitedPartnershipId3},
limited_partnership_id4=#{limitedPartnershipId4},
equity_template=#{equityTemplate},
partnership_template=#{partnershipTemplate},
item_id = #{itemId}
